1: ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs med shin tu dga'b dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te//rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o///sangs
2: rgas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o///de laji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na//skyon medg rag pa
3: gtan du ni//'dong chags thams cad rjes chags phyir//de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das//'dod chags chen po dga'b che zhes//rji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhi na/
4: gtan du dga' ba kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol pa de bzhin gshegs//kun du bzang o kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems mchog cho ga'o//de rje ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
5: gtso ba yin zhe na //dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis//rdo rje dbang chen thugs khar bsgyur//rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i grtso//dam pa'i dang po kyes bu'o //de la ji
6: ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na//bsam med rgya chen zab ba ni//dngos grub thams cad zad med pa//kun gyi dri ma med pa ni//byang chub sems bdag bstun pa
7: yin//de nas de'i yongs su las kyi khad par ni/soms brtan nd kyis sems dpa' ste//teng 'dzin sems dpa' bsgo ba'o//rnam par shes pa sems dpa' te//rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las//
8: rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o//rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni//nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa//zlaba 'dr bar yang dag blo//rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad//de la ji ltar b@om ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
